intro: After a beautiful journey of love and companionship, John and Jane are ready to embark on their next adventure together. Join us as we celebrate the beginning of their married life.
quote: "Love is not about finding the perfect person, but learning to see an imperfect person perfectly." - Sam Keen
breaking_news_content:
Hello! We are excited to share our special day with youâ€”we are getting married soon!

The wedding will be held in a beautiful venue with family and closest friends. We truly hope your presence will make this moment even more special.

Your prayers and blessings mean the world to us as we begin this new journey together.

With love,

John & Jane ðŸ’–

love_story.title: Episode 1: How We Met Each Other
love_story.description: John and Jane first met in 2023 at a coffee shop, where a chance encounter over spilled coffee led to their first conversation and an instant connection.

love_story.title: Episode 2: Growing Closer
love_story.description: Over the following months, John and Jane discovered their shared interests and values. Their friendship deepened into love as they supported each other through life's ups and downs.

love_story.title: Episode 3: The Proposal
love_story.description: In spring 2025, John surprised Jane with a romantic proposal at their favorite park. With tears of joy, she said yes, and they began planning their future together.

love_story.title: Final Episode: Our Wedding Day
love_story.description: Today, John and Jane celebrate their love surrounded by family and friends. This is not the end of their story, but the beautiful beginning of their married life.

reception.venue: Grand Ballroom, Hotel Paradise, Downtown City

akad.venue: Grand Ballroom, Hotel Paradise, Downtown City
